title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions:
1. Heat oil in a wok or large skillet
2. Add vegetables and stir fry for 5 minutes
3. Add soy sauce and cook for 2 more minutes
4. Serve hot with rice

title: Classic Pancakes
instructions:
1. Mix dry ingredients
2. Add wet ingredients and whisk
3. Cook on a griddle until bubbles form
4. Flip and cook other side
